titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 290 Broadway in New York, New York, as the "Ted Weiss Federal Building".
To designate the Federal building located at 290 Broadway in New York, New York, as the "Ted Weiss Federal Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 108-30.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: Mr. LaTourette moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 145.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 66.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates the Federal building located at 290 Broadway in New York, New York, as the Ted Weiss Federal Building.
